15.title: Use your own character?

151.content:
Profile: http://rp.aryion.com/fullinfo.php?sessio...

Play as Kiko?
151.title: Own character #1: Kiko

choices: A teeny shuffling from under the bed
1511.content:
You open your eyes slowly, only to close them again. You're awake, but you don't really want to fully 'wake up'. It's too comfortable here. You manage to open your eyes again halfway and survey the environment. It's a simple motel room, in which you're in the corner bed. A cabinet with a lamp and alarm clock are next to your head. There's a TV in the adjacent corner, the old rabbit-ears kind. Two doors are on either side of the opposite corner, one closed that leads outside, one half-open that leads to a small bathroom.

You shift a bit and bang your feet against the bedpost at the other end of the bed. Your toe is stubbed, and you wince in pain, now fully awake. You growl at the pain, and stop suddenly, sure you heard something... soon, the sound returns.
1511.title: Kiko - Waking up

15111.content:
You toss off the blankets to reveal your naked body and hang over the edge of the bed, looking underneath. Your tail swishes as you see movement in the darkness, your stubbed toe pain now distant. Baring an evil smirk, you hold perfectly still, waiting for the movement of whatever it was to come back, your mind thinking that indeed, whatever it was was breakfast.

Suddenly, a quick flash of motion makes itself apparent again, and you lunge under the bed, using every muscle in your body to direct yourself. Your mouth snaps shut on the small thing, and you pull out from under the bed, gloating. Letting it drop into your hand, you see that it is a micro...
15111.title: Quick hunt

151111.content:
You look at the tiny catgirl in your hand, her ears flicking wildly, her head darting around to take in the sights. Her gaze stops on your chest, as she slowly turns her head upward. When her eyes meet your, she flinches and jumps back, her rear hanging just between your index and middle finger. Her tail flicks against the back of your hand, but the rest of her can't seem to move, paralyzed on your palm.

"Hello, little thing," you say to her. She can't seem to respond, save for crawling away from you very slowly. You smirk, realizing she's absolutely terrified... clearly you need to help her loosen up. Or maybe put her out of her misery...
151111.title: Tiny, terrified... tcatgirl.

choices: Go back to sleep, you need energy to digest your meal.
Head out for a night on the town. You have places to go and people to eat.
1511111.content:
"Aw, don't be afraid there you poor little thing..." You say, trying to calm the terrified catgirl. However as she continues to back away you realize that it's hopeless. Well, no use in letting a perfect morsel like this go to waste. A wicked grin on your face you slowly raise her above your head and drop her. Not wanting to give her a chance to escape you quickly swallow her, chuckling a bit as she struggles inside of you.

Now then...
1511111.title: A purrrrrfect snack

choices: The catgirl. Once you've had cat, you'll never go back
The horse, of course; she'll fill you for weeks.
15111112.content:
Feeling the struggles of the catgirl in your belly, you smirk, tail thwapping behind you. She keeps up her wriggling; it feels like her tiny body is slamming against the walls in a desperate attempt to break through. You chuckle as your stomach gurgles, her struggles weakening... soon disappearing altogether. You wonder where she came from to begin with, but no matter now; all that matters is where she'll come out.

You glance at the bed, and think how comfortable it is... but you've woken up to too much of a degree to even think of sleeping. You look at the window and see it's still dark out. Excellent, cover. You quickly toss on your traveling clothes; a black tanktop with a cotton violet mini. No need for underwear; it would probably get in the way soon enough.

Heading out the door, you look around and find the area to be only slightly busy, the occasional car or group of people on the sidewalk. Your minicat appetizer's gotten you all worked up for more, and right off the bat you see two possible meals; Another catgirl on the sidewalk opposite from you, who shocked you as looking almost exactly like the first... though her eyes were just a bit thinner, and her body a tad more petite (for her size, anyway). Off down your side of the street, you see an anthro horsegirl... she seems like quite the filling meal, barely fitting into her tight jeans and sports bra. Licking your lips, you go after...
15111112.title: Off into the night

15112.content:
*KNOCK KNOCK KNOCK! KNOCK KNOCK! K to the N to the O and the C and dont forget the K!*
Great. Somebody's knocking at the door! Not just a simple friendly gesture knock, but a loud, earth-shattering knock that hurts those frail little doggy ears of yours. Geez, youre surprised that didnt tear the door down!

It's not enough that you stubbed your toe. Now you have to force yourself to walk all the way to the front door on it! With a hard sigh, you wrap toss the covers off of you, but then realize youre not wearing anything underneath! Not wanting to show off your lovely naked body to just ANYONE, you wrap the blanket around you.

After getting up from the bed, you slowly and carefully set your foot down on the carpet to test how bad your toe is...
...And grit your teeth while sucking in air at the painful feeling! It felt like it was worse than stubbed. It was broken! That bedpost mustve been harder than you thought!

Still, you bite your lip and continue toward the door, whimpering with each painful step. Luckily, it wasnt that long of a walk. After combing your hair down a little, you turn the knob and open the door...

Standing in front of you is a young clean cut man in a business suit with a plastered smile on his face... and wielding a knife in his hand! You almost jump back out of instinct from this guy brandishing a weapon right in front of you, but then he speaks.

"Good morning, ma'am!" he greeted in a fake uppity tone, "Im Rick and Im with Cutco Cutlery, the world's sharpest, most effective, and undeniably the best clean cutting knives ever made! Im going to door-to-door to talk about what Cutco's finest can do for you!"

Oh god, it's a door-to-door salesman! Possibly the worst type of predator in existence! They prey on the innocent creautures sitting in their house trying to sleep watch tv, spend time with their families, go to the john, etc. and annoy their hopeless victims to death talking for hours on end about stuff they dont need in attempts to gain their own special food source from their prey: MONEY!

This was definitely NOT how you want to start your day! You feel like tearing him to shreds for aiding the aching pain in your poor little toe. Like hell you would waste your day like this when there's hunting to be done!

But then again, he's selling knives. And from what he said, thee knives are the 'world's sharpest, most effective, and undeniably the best clean cutting knives'. They could come in handy for cutting some fine meat... just trying to bite through rough flesh all the time can be quite a hassle! Maybe you'd like to see what 'Cutco' is capable of...
...or maybe you'd rather start your day off with an EASY breakfast...
15112.title: The Worst Type of Predator in Existence...

151122.content: "Uh, let me put some clothes on, then we can talk." You say, quickly rushing to put some clothes on. Once you have put on a rather tight fitting white shirt and shorts combo you head back to the door, opening it and practically dragging the salesman in. "You fascinate me, sir. I would like to...
151122.title: Just a moment

1512.content:
Weaving your webs of shadow through the caves, catacombs and tunnels you are the queen of your domain.

All who dare to intrude are your food for you or your brood.

Although distantly related to the common spiders of the earth your stature is such that the humans that would tread a spider under foot are little more than a snack to you.

Is Shelob the spider for you or maybe you have something else in mind.

Small spiders also need feeding and some spiders are a little less ordinary.
1512.title: Shelob - the arachnid

choices: Continue Shelob in the concrete jungle?
15121.content:
Climbing up from your lair you patrol your traps to see whether any tasty meals have become entangled in your webbing.

Up here in the noise and light the humans believe that they are the dominant species, unaware that to you they are just tasty snacks.

The vertical shaft you are exploring bares the scent of your prey but it appears to be hidden from your sight. Fortunately you are very familiar with the moving rooms of humanity and when the opportunity arises you scurry onto the roof of the metal box.

Inside you can sense a number of tasty humans but instincts warn you to isolate your prey. You know that although humans are weak individually they can be dangerous in groups.

You are patient and will wait until you can take a lone human riding in the elevator.
15121.title: Shelob the giant spider?

choices: Wait for another meal to come to you?
Go hunting among the offices and cubicles?
Where else could you find some tasty meals?
151211.content:
Your patience is rewarded when the movement of the elevator decreases as most of the humans in the office block leave work, leaving only a few scattered around the building. Humans working late to meet deadlines and custodial staff doing their normal shifts.

They are all potential prey as far as you are concerned and whether they are minimum wage cleaners or highly paid executives they are all equally qualified to fill your belly.

The electric lights illuminate the single passenger in the elevator car and you consider whether she will be filling enough.

You had no great interest in her as an individual but like any predator you had learned enough about your prey to predict their behaviour. She is wearing a heavy jacket, clearly on her way home as it’s cold out tonight, which meant that if you did not take her now them you would miss your chance. Unless you wanted to chase her outside but you didn’t think her worth that much effort.

Although there was plenty of other prey still moving around this office block you knew from experience that the females working here were delicious. You aren’t concerned about the hard work she had put in to reach her current position or her ambitions for promotion. When your stinger strikes, filling her belly with your potent venom, your only thought is for how tasty she will be.

The human female clutches her belly, not understanding what is happening or why her stomach seems to burn. Like most of her kind she freezes when she sees you, giving you the opportunity to spray her with webbing and yank her out of the elevator where you can deal with her at your leisure.
151211.title: Continue Shelob in the concrete jungle?

choices: Continue the hunt in the offices?
1512112.content:
You wrap your future meal up tightly and consider whether this will be enough. You belly is heavy with eggs so you decide to grab another snack before taking this one back to your larder.

Securing the paralysed prey so she was suspended beneath the elevator car you go in hunt for more food.

This office block is one of your favourite places to hunt as not only is it full of juicy humans but the high ceilings and exposed ducts and pipes that the architects had chosen to give it a bit of character made it perfect for a giant arachnid to move around in.

Crawling along the top of an air-conditioning duct you noticed a blonde who had apparently fallen asleep at her keyboard. Clearly another hard worker who had stayed late to complete some task she thought was essential.

Not that you cared about the deadline she had been trying to meet as you quietly lowered yourself to her and drove your fang through her ear, filling her brain with venom. She let out a grunt and may have tried to stand but sucking on her head you slurped up her brain as your venom reduced it to a nutritious slurry.

The blonde never would finish her report and when you finished you left behind an empty bag of bones, still wearing the designer suit she had thought would get her promoted.

With your hunger sated you climbed back to the ceiling and after a moments thought pulled the drained carcase up as well. Leaving the girls remains laying on top of the air-conditioning duct where it would probably not be found for months if not years.
1512112.title: Go hunting among the offices and cubicles?

152.content: Still other? Ah, maybe you like mech vore?
152.title: Mechs?

choices: The hovercycle floats and dived at Bristo
1522.content: Bistro the mechanic was fixing a large hub with his spanner, sighing he turned to his customer, who turned out to be a well-endowed female with lacy golden hair that fell around in sheens of spun flax. As he had his back turned, the hovercycle behind him activated with a whir as he directed her towards a mecha with the name of... Chrysler534... Bristol was shocked at this development.
1522.title: Other

info.brief_description: Vore: Become a predator and consume all who oppose you.
info.description:
UPDATED AS OF AUGUST 11, 2007
-Gift points given out pumped up to 375 per chapter
-Prey chapters / story arcs allowed (READ THE DETAILS BEFORE ADDING ONE)

Hallo there, and welcome to Hungry, a vore interactive where you're the pred. No, that's not a typo, I did say pred. With a 'd'. As in predator... well, you get the point.

So, what're the rules of this interactive? Well, I can safely say there aren't many, if any at all. Remember, you're the dom; if you want to crap out a steaming pile of prey, sex/yiff them, consume them with holes other than the mouth, you're completely welcome to. You want to bring in other fetishes for extra garnish, heck, be my guest. Hell, I shouldn't be saying you can, you should be telling me you can. But I digest- err, digress.

What's the only real limit? Well... no one-line chapters, and no one-choice chapters. If you're going to write a chapter, I appreciate it, it doesn't have to be Ayn Rand level or anything, but anything like "You eat her and then go... (choice)" IS getting deleted. And always leave 2 choices at the end of a chapter. Any chapters that I'm informed only have one choice at the end will likely have another choice added to them by me. Wouldn't you really rather choose both possible outcomes?

**UPDATE** The focus of this story is to be the predator; the dominant one. If, despite your best efforts, you happen to fall prey to someone, that's the way the cookie crumbles. Suffice to say, chapters where 'you' are prey are allowed, but best kept to a minimum. If this is abused, the old system of pred-only will be brought back. Hopefully this policy will work out alright.

One last thing. This story is written in 2nd person. In other words, "You do this", not "I do that" or "She does this".

Right. That's about it. Enter and consume 'til you pop!
